27FD9937.Line7.6DE47: It's Prava. Even she didn't survive this.

63312C19.VoiceDir3.7FA05: Nearby, Donan sees the glow of the soulstone from beneath a dead Knight Penitent. He knows what it is--he's familiar with the soulstone.

F427C5EC.Line3.7FA05: I know that glow. It's the soulstone.

FD25A59B.VoiceDir5.7FA05: curious, seeing something glowing beneath Prava
